title: MESMERIC EXPERIENCE WITH REJANE/ Non-verbal hypnosis with 2 subjects at a time
description:
Rejane is part of the non-verbal school of Dr. Marco Paret and she will demonstrate the powerful techniques that she masters. She is hypnotizing two subjects only with the power of the gaze without using any words. Our true self is non-verbal, discover its deepest layers with non-verbal hypnosis. Dr. Marco Paret is teaching the ancient traditions of mesmerism and fascination - the hypnotic power of the gaze, in modern times. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
